chara.textHome:
Phew, I just made it...
I'm glad I wasn't late!

Sis and the others are up ahead,
let's catch up to them.
I'm back...
This fish? I got it by the pier.

I woke up early and went by the water...
There was this fisherman who caught it,
and he shared it with me!
Tada!

Today's lunch is the Tamaki Sisters
Special Bento!

Check it out! Pickled plum lotus root...
We picked foods that wouldn't
go bad in the heat!

It's strange... A summer ocean sunset is
beautiful but kinda scary. I don't know,
it's almost too beautiful, too spectacular...
like it's going to take me along with it.

The waves, the bugs, the wind,
and all the sandals...

When these sounds of the summer
come together it almost makes a song.
I love how it makes me feel.

Swimming in the ocean is only one of
the things I want to do this summer!

I want to go to the pool, go hiking,
see some fireworks, there's even
a summer choir I'd like to see too!
I could go on and on...
Wait, I know what this is, I've studied it...
It's a Witch, isn't it?

I can't let it ruin everyone's
summer vacation...
I have to take care of it quickly.

Apparently you can find Magical Girls in
swimsuits in Endless Mirrors sometimes.

I'm curious who's in there,
but I'd feel bad if I went looking...
It'd be embarrassing for them.

Phew, how about a little break
with some tea?

A tall glass with tons of ice,
it's going to be great!

I know the universe is neverending,
but the ocean almost feels like it is too...
It's just so big...
I'm only a grain of sand when compared to it.
Whoa, this shell is so beautiful!

I'm thinking about finding some more
to make something like an accessory!
They'd make a really cute hair clip!
*Giggle*
Um... I'm not if I'm going to be able to go in...
Just don't let go of my hand...
I'm going to try getting used to the water!
Hey, listen to this!

Me and others ate nagashi
somen the other day!

Those noodles going down that bamboo
slide are so difficult to catch!
Next time I'll get them, though!
I love how this smells...

I know it may make me weird,
but the smell of citronella candles
just kinda puts me at ease.
*Giggle*
This is the swimsuit I bought with my sister.
It's my first one too...
I'll treasure it forever!

Look, this is a photo we all took at
the beach to remember the occasion.

You can really see how slender
and beautiful Yachiyo really is!
That felt great...

It was so nice getting all the sand off
in the shower.

After I go into the ocean,
my hair feels all weird,
like it's not even mine.
